channel.title: Publications on Marine Microbial Macroecology Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Publications on Marine Microbial Macroecology Lab

item.title: Projected plankton community change featured at the BBC
item.description: Work by Andrew Barton and Charlie Stock (Princeton/GFDL) and Andrew Irwin and Zoe Finkel showing how North Atlantic phytoplankton communities may chnage over the next century was published today in PNAS. A news story about this work appeared on the BBC website.

item.title: Research on extinction rates published in Science
item.description: Fossils helping to identify marine life at high risk of extinction

item.title: Changing phytoplankton niches
item.description: New paper on phytoplankton niches published in PNAS.
